## Paradigms of Learning {.smaller}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="33%" .fragment}
**Supervised Learning**

- Data with labels (supervision)
- *Digit Recognition, Sentiment Analysis*
:::

::: {.column width="33%" .fragment}
**Unsupervised Learning**

- Just Data. Try to find trends/groupings; clustering
- *Grouping pictures by faces, Fraud detection*
:::

::: {.column width="33%" .fragment}
**Sequential Learning**

- A dynamic environment that can return feedback
- *Robot navigation, Chess*
:::

::::

## Sequential Learning - A Demo

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%" .fragment}
**MENACE**

- **M**achine **E**ducable **N**oughts **A**nd **C**rosses **E**ngine
- A machine capable of learning to be a better player of Noughts and Crosses (Tic-Tac-Toe)
- MENACE was built using 304 matchboxes by Donald Michie in 1961.
- Demo credits: [mscroggs](https://www.mscroggs.co.uk/blog/19)
:::
